pull.title: streams: Accept URef obj for VectorReader unserialize
pull.body: Missed in commit 172f5fa738d419efda99542e2ad2a0f4db5be580. An URef may collapse into an LRef or RRef depending on context. There is no reason to forbid RRef in `VectorReader::operator>>`, so add it for consistency.
